choices: The Suomus Independent Volunteer Aerial Squadron
1.content:
Which of the Witches Squadron will you choose?

(This does include other squadrons that may or may not be well known outside of Japan or those who have access.)
1.title: The Squadrons Pt 1

11.content:
The 501st huh? AKA the Strike Witches

So who will be the one to grow?



Will it be;

The protagonist of Strike Witches anime and the unofficial squadron medic, Yoshika Miyafuji?

The oldest Witch of the 501st, Mio Sakamoto?

The commander of the 501st, Minna-Dietlinde Wilcke?

The sharpshooter Lynette Bishop?
11.title: The 501st Members Pt 1

111.content: So, how will Yoshika grow?
111.title: Yoshika Miyafuji

112.content:
Mio will grow?

Alright, what will it be?
112.title: Mio Sakamoto

1122.content: Will it be her breasts that will expand or her butt?
1122.title: Expansion

113.content:
The commander of the 501st herself huh?

Now choose;
113.title: Minna-Dietlinde Wilcke

1132.content: Will it be her breasts or her famous butt?
1132.title: Expansion

114.content:
The only Brittanian member will be the one to grow then?

So now make your choice,
114.title: Lynette Bishop

115.content:
How about;

The prissy and sometimes difficult noble girl, Perrine H. Clostermann? (Who also has a crush on Mio Sakamoto)

The "ultra ace" slacker, Erica Hartmann?

The quiet, efficient, and private member of the squadron, Gertrud Barkhorn?

Or the childish and self-indulgent Francesca Lucchini?
115.title: The 501st Members Pt 2

1151.content:
Ah~, the noble girl huh?

Will be interesting to see her grow,
1151.title: Perrine H. Clostermann

11512.content: Will it be to finally have 'volume' on her chest? or her ass?
11512.title: Expansion

1152.content: The ever messy yet awesome Ace Hartmann!
1152.title: Erica Hartmann

1153.content: Time for the serious solder from Karlsland to get bigger,
1153.title: Gertrud Barkhorn

choices: Nein, make her both top AND bottom heavy! (Both)
11532.content: Oh, how will she be able to be a proper Karlslander soldier if she is top/bottom heavy?
11532.title: Expansion

1154.content: The ever hyper (and boob feeling) girl from Romagna is to be the one to grow then?
1154.title: Francesca Lucchini

11542.content: Time for her 'growth spurt' I suppose.
11542.title: Expansion

choices: Have more than one witch grow instead.
1155.content:
And now to the final members of the 501st. Will it be;

The magnanimous, tall, and buxom Liberion Witch, Charlotte E. Yeager?

The fortune-telling Suomus Ace, Eila Ilmatar Juutilainen?

The shy 'night witch', Sanya V. Litvyak?

Or the newest member, Shizuka Hattori?
1155.title: The 501st Members Pt 3

11551.content: Time for the Witch speedster to get even bigger.
11551.title: Charlotte E. Yeager

choices: Nah, give her a bigger ass instead! (Butt)
Maker her bigger in both areas! (Both)
115512.content: The buxom Liberion Witch is quite big already, so about make her even bigger?
115512.title: Expansion

11552.content: Let's see if she can even predict what will happen to her~
11552.title: Eila Ilmatar Juutilainen

115522.content: Can she even dodge attacks with things weighing her down?
115522.title: Expansion

11553.content: Perhaps it's time for the shy one to rise or so?
11553.title: Sanya V. Litvyak

115532.content: Will the night witch 'develop' in the,
115532.title: Expansion

choices: As the new member of the 501st.
Before she was a member. (During the Strike Witches movie perhaps?)
11554.content: Before choosing how Hattori will grow, will she grow when she is now a member of the 501st or before?
11554.title: Shizuka Hattori

115541.content:
Alright, so Shizuka is going to grow as a member of the 501st.

Choose;
115541.title: As part of the 501st

115542.content:
So, Shizuka will grow before she became a member of the 501st?

Whether it is during the movie or not is up in the air.
115542.title: Pre 501st

12.content:
So, which girl in the Brave Witches Squadron, (or the lesser nickname, Break Witches), will grow?

The main heroine of Brave Witches anime, Hikari Karibuchi?

The Witch capable of infusing magic on her right hand powerful enough to break through a Neuroi core and destroy it, Naoe Kanno?

The Witch who has suffered misfortunes such as having crash landings and destroying her Striker Units, Nikka Edvardine Katajainen or "Nipa"?

The easy-going optimist veteran ace, and hard-drinking *ahem* womanizer, Waltrud Krupinski?
12.title: The 502nd members Pt 1

121.content: Grow the Brave Witches heroine!
121.title: Hikari Karibuchi

122.content: Let's make this short brash Fuso Witch grow,
122.title: Naoe Kanno

123.content: Time for more misfortune (in a way) to befall on poor Nipa,
123.title: Nipa

124.content: Oh boy... guess it's going to be this womanizing Witch from Karlsland who is going to grow...
124.title: Waltrud Krupinski

info.brief_description: Grow any of the girls from the Strike Witches universe!
info.description:
Greetings!
This is a Growth Interactive for the Strike Witches series!

https://worldwitches.fandom.com/wiki/World_Witches_Series_Wiki

But to put it simply; The series revolves around teenage girls who use machines attached to their legs to do aerial combat against an alien race(?) called the Neuroi on an alternate Earth during the time of World War II.

Now keep in mind, the names of the nations are completely different from our Earth (more so with one particular nation with the continent(s) it is from looking completely different);

RL - Strike Witches World

Japan - Fuso
Britain - Britannia
France - Gallia
Germany - Karlsland
Finland - Suomus
Russia - Orussia
Italy - Romagna
America (U.S.A.) - Liberion
And several others that I won't bother to list here.

This is just a heads up if you're going to mention the Witch(es) home country.



-Rules-

1. The main focus is on making the girls Grow; so anything goes! Whether it be making them Giantess's or making their breasts/butts/or overall body, to expand, etc, etc, that's all up to you.

2. This means; no shrinking, only focus on making the girl(s) getting bigger!

3. Clothes DO NOT grow with the characters for whatever reason.

4. No male growth of any sort, okay?

5A. There's no limit to how big the girls can get, but please; whether you go slow medium or fast, make the growth/expansions or whatever as detailed as possible. So no instant growth's, period!

5B. This also applies to any additions added; make the whole chapter be detailed and not too short. Prefer it to be at least a paragraph

6. If you're going to end a plotline, don't end a story too soon, please...

7A. While this is sort of becomes redundant, please don't make the characters too OOC. (IE; character(s) that clearly do not like what's happening to her/them, or at first was okay but changes her/their mind later.)

7B. The only exception of going a bit OOC is unless it affects them mentally in some way. (So unless her/their minds are affected basically. Like in a certain episode of the Third Season of the Strike Witches anime)

8. No Toilet stuff.

9. Destruction and (if going Giantess) Vore are allowed, but again; keep in mind with the character's personality. Such as if a character does not want to cause destruction; accidental/unintentional ones are allowed.

10. Please use good grammar or at the very least be readable.

11. Sexual is allowed, just don't go too much into the fine details.

12. When it comes to this particular series, Please do not do something as arbitrary as changing the 'race' of the girl(s) of all things! The main focus is the growth/expansion only!

13. I reserve the right to edit (fix) or remove any chapter(s)

And that is all.
Please enjoy.
